name: multitenant-saas-root
description: Root management for Multi-Tenant SaaS Ecosystem

scripts.start:apis: concurrently -n "SAAS-API,GP-API,BK-API" -c "blue.bold,cyan.bold,yellow.bold" "npm run start:api:saas" "dotnet run --project modules/GreenPantry/backend/GreenPantry.API/GreenPantry.API.csproj --urls http://0.0.0.0:7001" "dotnet run --project modules/BangaruKottu/backend/Vendor.API/Vendor.API.csproj --urls http://0.0.0.0:7002"
scripts.start:uis: concurrently -n "SaaS-UI,GP-UI,OMEGA,BK-UI" -c "bgGreen,bgMagenta,bgYellow,bgWhite" "npm run start:ui:saas" "npm run start:ui:greenpantry" "npm run start:ui:omegatech" "npm run start:ui:bangaru"
scripts.start:ui:saas: wait-on http-get://127.0.0.1:5114/health && cd src/frontend && npm run dev -- --port 5173 --open
scripts.start:ui:greenpantry: wait-on http-get://localhost:7001/health && cd modules/GreenPantry/frontend && npm run dev -- --port 5174
scripts.start:ui:omegatech: wait-on http-get://localhost:5114/health && cd modules/OmegaTech && npm start
scripts.start:ui:bangaru: wait-on http-get://localhost:7002/health && cd modules/BangaruKottu/frontend && npm run dev -- --port 5176
scripts.install-all: npm install --prefix src/frontend && npm install --prefix modules/GreenPantry/frontend && npm install --prefix modules/BangaruKottu/frontend && npm install --prefix modules/OmegaTech
